columns.content:
The Models section of the Hippocampus Hub Build portal provides direct access to hippocampal cell models from internal and external resources.

Users can visualize model metadata, download the model related NEURON .mod files or open the model page on the source website.

Model (i.e., .mod) files can also be selected and sent to the EBRAINS Hodgkin-Huxley Neuron Builder, where a NEURON model can be optimized against electrophysiological data through the BluePyOpt.

While navigating the Hippocampus Hub Build section, the user is able visualize a plethora of morphologies and NEURON .mod files gathered from the dedicated portals directly referenced in our website. In order to actively use these resources in a model building workflow, we integrated our pages with the EBRAINS Hodgking Huxley Neuron Builder (HHNB) tool, which allows to optimize a single cell NEURON model against electrophysiological data and run it on a dedicated simulation environment, the EBRAINS BlueNaas (NEURON As A Service). Start exploring the Hippocampus portal in order to take advantage of this functionality or direct access the HHNB webapp by clicking on the button below.
